overview: Ivan Alekseevich, a high-ranking official, dies and finds himself in the house of his childhood, in the atmosphere where he began his life; he meets there a strange character resembling an angel. Together they try to look at the life of the protagonist from a different angle and evaluate his actions. Any judgments that do not coincide with our ideas and beliefs, no matter whom these judgments come from, we call nonsense, therefore nothing will force a person to change their principles, even the strangest signs coming from outside.
title: Nonsense
